description: Tables, API Groups, and API Endpoints

results.name: creates a table with name and description
results.command: xano table create -p mcp-server -w 40 --name integration_table_test_1768166046103 --description "Integration test table" -o json

results.name: creates a table from XanoScript file
shows error when creating table without required fields
creates an API group with swagger enabled
results.command: xano apigroup create -p mcp-server -w 40 --name integration_group_test_1768166046103 --description "Integration test API group" --swagger -o json

results.name: shows error when creating API group without required fields
creates a GET API endpoint
results.command: xano api create 291 -p mcp-server -w 40 --name get_endpoint_test_1768166046103 --verb GET --description "GET endpoint test" -o json

results.name: creates a POST API endpoint
results.command: xano api create 291 -p mcp-server -w 40 --name post_endpoint_test_1768166046103 --verb POST --description "POST endpoint test" -o json

results.name: shows error when creating API without verb
results.error: Either --name and --verb, --file, or --stdin must be provided

results.name: lists tables in JSON format and finds created tables
